description.fr: Vaincre tous les Craqueleurs. \--- {%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Déclenche {value:x} fois une {#ROCKFALL}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Ajoute le sort {Spell:855} à votre main.
description.en: Defeat all the Cracklers. \--- {%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Triggers a {#ROCKFALL} {value:x} {x, plural, one[time] other[times]}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Adds the {Spell:855} spell to your hand.
description.es: Vencer a todos los crujidores. \--- {%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Activa {value:x} {x, plural, one[vez] other[veces]} una {#ROCKFALL}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Añade el hechizo {Spell:855} a tu mano.
description.de: Alle Krachler besiegen. \--- {%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Löst {value:x}-mal einen {#ROCKFALL} aus. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Fügt deiner Hand den Zauber {Spell:855} hinzu.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Smagadores. \--- {%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Aciona {value:x} {x, plural, one[vez] other[vezes]} uma {#ROCKFALL}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Adiciona o feitiço {Spell:855} à sua mão.
